ul.li: Why walk when you can ride? Zip around your facility with a ride-on electric pallet jack!
Lift even the hardest loads in no time at all with 6,000 lbs. of lift capacity!
Low hours with just over 1500 hours of operation!
27½" x 93" extended forks allows for easy handling of longer pallets!

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #313131;

p.span: Used Crown Electric Pallet Jack for sale at American Surplus is in stock. All used electric pallet jacks from ASI are cleaned, tested, painted and have a 30 day ASI guarantee. We make sure all functions are operational when you receive your truck! This electric pallet jack has a 6,000 lb. capacity. The forks on this unit are 27½" x 93", and it is the ride on style of pallet jacks. It comes with a 24V battery and a charger. Call today to learn more about our used Crown electric pallet jack and get a quote today.

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #313131;

strong.style: box-sizing: border-box; line-height: inherit; color: #ff0000; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff;

span.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used electric pallet jacks 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
